cause.description:
This is the cause where Brenna Kleiman fans can unite and assist her in whatever way they want. They can donate, they can buy her stuff, etc. Basically, it is a fan club to the amazingness that is Brenna Kleiman. Self-centered? Maybe. Worth-while? You bet your muffin.
1. Bree rocks.
2. Bree is sheer amazingness in human form.
3. Bree is completely and totally humble by making a cause in her name.
cause.mission: support Brenna Kleiman emotionally and/or financially in whatever way possible.
cause.name: The Bree Fund.
